description.title: Submission
description.detail: A submission contains submission actions to be performed by the archive. A submission can add more objects to the archive, update already submitted objects or make objects publicly available.

description.title: Study
description.detail: A study groups together data submitted to the archive. A study accession is typically used when citing data submitted to ENA. Note that all associated data and other objects are made public when the study is released.

description.title: Project
description.detail: A project groups together data submitted to the archive. A project accession is typically used when citing data submitted to ENA. Note that all associated data and other objects are made public when the project is released.

description.title: Sample
description.detail: A sample contains information about the sequenced source material. Samples are typically associated with checklists, which define the fields used to annotate the samples.

description.title: Experiment
description.detail: An experiment contain information about a sequencing experiment including library and instrument details.

description.title: Run
description.detail: A run is part of an experiment and refers to data files containing sequence reads.

description.title: Analysis
description.detail: An analysis contains secondary analysis results derived from sequence reads (e.g. a genome assembly),

description.title: DAC
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data access committee (DAC) is required for authorized access submissions.

description.title: Policy
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data access policy is required for authorized access submissions.

description.title: Dataset
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data set is required for authorized access submissions.
